name: instance-initializer
description: Create & initialises a sandbox by deploying code & data and bootstrapping the instance (i.e. builds the search index).
author: Salesforce Customer Success Group

scripts.postinstall: npm explore workspace-bootstrap-scripts -- node scripts/postinstall.js && npm explore workspace-bootstrap-scripts -- shx pwd cp ./dw.json ../../dw.json
scripts.sandbox:postsandboxcreate: npm explore workspace-bootstrap-scripts -- node scripts/postsandboxcreate.js && npm explore workspace-bootstrap-scripts -- shx cp ./dw.json ../../dw.json
scripts.data:zip: cd node_modules/refarchdata/ && cross-zip -r -q demo_data_sfra.zip demo_data_sfra && shx mv demo_data_sfra.zip ../../demo_data_sfra.zip
scripts.code:prepare: cd ./node_modules/sfra/storefront-reference-architecture && nvm use 12.18.1 && npm install && npm run compile:fonts && npm run compile:js && npm run compile:scss
scripts.code:zip: cd ./node_modules/sfra && shx mkdir -p ../../tmp/version1 && shx cp -R storefront-reference-architecture/cartridges/* ../../tmp/version1 && shx cp -R plugin_cartridge_merge/cartridges/* ../../tmp/version1 &&  shx cp -R plugin_wishlist/cartridges/* ../../tmp/version1 && cd ../../tmp && cross-zip -r -q version1.zip version1 && shx rm -r version1
scripts.plugin:prepare: cd ./node_modules/plugin_serviceworker && shx cp ../../dw.json dw.json && npm install && npm run data:create && npm run data:upload && npm run data:import
scripts.cleanup: shx rm -f sandbox.output && shx rm -f demo_data_sfra.zip
scripts.all: npm-run-all cleanup auth sandbox:* data:* code:* plugin:* cleanup
